sentences.sContent: The birds returned to their nests and continued to incubate the eggs.
sentences.sCn: 那些鸟儿返巢继续孵卵。

synos.tran: 孵化；培养；温育；逐渐发展

words.tran: 孵化；[病毒][医] 潜伏；抱蛋
[禽] 孵卵器；[儿科] 保温箱；早产儿保育器；细菌培养器

trans.tranCn: 孵化；培养；温育；逐渐发展
trans.tranOther: if a bird incubates its eggs, or if the eggs incubate, they are kept warm until they hatch(= the birds inside are born )
